message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be extremely valuable to you. While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.  This price reflects the potential value I see in this product for you. Please let me know your decision, as I have another interested buyer ready to purchase it for $1200000.
